name: SendWo
description: SendWo is a no-code powerful WhatsApp API solution for businesses and enterprises. With its efficient AI-powered chatbot, bulk broadcasting, scalable WhatsApp messaging solution, and powerful 3rd party integration, It helps businesses to setup the best conversational marketing experience.
focus_areas: AI Powered No Code WhatsApp Chatbot built on top of Open AI and WhatsApp API.
Bulk Messaging and Campaigns: Enabling businesses to send bulk WhatsApp messages for promotions, product updates, or customer announcements
Live chat inbox management and follow-ups setup working like WhatsApp CRM
